item.title: Virtual poster presentations with blender
item.description: Recently Six Eight months ago I submitted a poster to a small conference that has been moved onto a virtual platform because of the ongoing pandemic.

item.title: init()
item.description: Welcome to my new website. After a rather extensive hiatus from posting about my PhD work (Virtual Reality for Mice ), I’ve decided to create a personal website to write the occasional piece on whatever I think might be interesting to others.
